Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Joseph Elkind Union Membership Papers TAM 602
0.25 Linear Feet in 1 manuscript box
1919-1977 Joesph Elkind (1889-1974) was a member of the International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades (IBPAT), specifically its New York City District Council 9. The collection contains membership cards, dues books, insurance policy materials and correspondence regarding insurance held through the IBPAT, and through the Workmen's Circle. Materials are in English
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials found in collection; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 2011.144.
Arrangement
Folders arranged alphabetically.
Historical/Biographical Note
Joesph Elkind (1889-1974) was a member of the International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades (IBPAT), specifically its New York City District Council 9. (The IBPAT was known as the Brotherhood of Painters, Decorators and Paperhangers of America during most of the period of Elkind's membership.)
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Collection name; Collection number; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Scope and Contents
The collection contains membership cards, dues books, insurance policy materials and correspondence regarding insurance held through the IBPAT, and through the Workmen's Circle.
Conditions Governing Use
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1919-1977, are expected to enter the public domain in 2107.
